title: Designing Interactive Online Leadership Education Based on Constructive Developmental Theory for Adults

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational leadership theory and online learning tool utilization experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a BYOD environment for science sector managers/leaders, focusing on summative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply core concepts of Adult Constructive Development Theory (ACD) to scientific problem-solving.
Learners can integrate diverse perspectives from peer interactions on online discussion platforms to design decision-making models.
Learners can develop self-directed learning strategies to complete scientific leadership tasks in blended environments with over 80% completion.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
